articles.author: Katie Camero
articles.title: New York Had Biggest Drop In Life Expectancy Due to COVID, A New CDC Report Shows
articles.description: The declines in life expectancy we’re seeing are actually “historically unprecedented,” one expert said.
articles.content:
Life expectancy in the US had mostly been on an upward march in the 21st century. Then COVID hit.
From 2019 to 2020 life expectancy dropped for all 50 states and Washington, DC, by about 1.8 years, … [+3635 chars]

articles.author: Megan Liscomb
articles.title: If You've Ever Been "Quiet Fired" Or "Managed Out" Of A Job, We Want To Hear From You
articles.description: Everyone's talking about "quiet quitting" these days, but what about "quiet firing"? If you've ever had your schedule cut until you quit or been otherwise manipulated into leaving a job, we want to hear your story.
